text: Warner Bros debuted the first look at A Star Is Born, directed by and starring Bradley Cooper alongside Lady Gaga. “ It ’ s a big swing, this movie, ” said Cooper, who co - wrote the script and spent several years selling the studio on his vision, and his belief that Lady Gaga could launch as a feature star the way that Whitney Houston did in The Bodyguard. Cooper told the CinemaCon crowd that always wanted to do a love story and the best way to express that is through music. Cooper REX / Shutterstock “ We jumped on stage in front of real crowds, ” said Cooper. In the new movie, Cooper plays Jackson Maine, a country music star on the brink of decline when he discovers a talented unknown named Ally ( Gaga ).
